name: Go Night Pro | WordPress Dark Mode Plugin
author: Web_Trendy

sections.description:
Dark mode is a new trend on web design. Desktop apps like Adobe Softwares have already implemented dark mode into their UI, now this plugin adds dark mode/night mode feature into your WordPress installation. Dark mode/Night mode also helps. With version 1.1 now you can select button type, location and activated it on each page you want. Also save last time mode is added that save user choices for the last time. You can also define a period of time in which the dark mode would be automatically active on your website.

Note:
The free version may have incompatibility with your theme. For a full featured version of the plugin alongside 24/7 technical support, please purchase the Premium version.

Credit

Here we thank everyone involved in production, testing and evolution of this plugin. Developers, third parties, online communities and buyers, we appreciate you all. ðŸ˜Ž
sections.installation:
Installation and configuration is super easy! Just follow these steps:

  1. Copy the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or in WordPress admin panel go to plugins menu and upload the plugin zip file.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to plugin settings at Go Night menu, update the options.
  4. Go to front end of your website and refresh the page.
sections.faq:
Is it mobile compatible?

Yes, the plugin is totally device responsive and cross-platform. You can use it on phone, tablet, ipad, laptop or large screens.

Is there any dependencies for this plugin?

No, the plugin is a stand-alone set of scripts and requires no other plugins or third-party scripts to work.

My theme is not supported?

If your theme is not fully or partially supported, immediately contact the author to add support, beside that if you are familiar with code, you can inspect your page and find out which element has a background color. Add the class name of elements that have a dedicated background color in “Custom Elements” section. (define multiple elements devided by commas)

short_description: Go Night Pro Dark Mode/Night Mode WordPress Plugin enables dark mode or night mode with multiple options for your website.
description:
Dark mode is a new trend on web design. Also save last time mode is added that save user choices for the last time. You can also define a period of time in which the dark mode would be automatically active on your website.

Note:
